Bash(cd "J:/mc/mods" && python3 -c "
import json
with open\('src/main/resources/assets/areas-hint/lang/zh_cn.json','r',encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    zh = json.load\(f\)
with open\('src/main/resources/assets/areas-hint/lang/en_us.json','r',encoding='utf-8'\) as f:
    en = json.load\(f\)
missing = [k for k in zh if k not in en]
print\(f'zh_cn keys: {len\(zh\)}, en_us keys: {len\(en\)}, missing in en_us: {len\(missing\)}'\)
if missing:
    for k in missing[:20]:
        print\(f'  {k}: {zh[k]}'\)
    if len\(missing\) > 20:
        print\(f'  ... and {len\(missing\)-20} more'\)
" 2>&1)
